title: Depression, Anxiety and stress scale
description:
This test is designed to measure your psychological state with regards to the degree of depression, stress and anxiety. Please read
            the test sentences and choose the best answer that fits you during
            the last 2 weeks.
            See More

title: OCD scale
description:
Obsessions are unwelcome or distressing ideas, thoughts, images or impulses that repeatedly enter your mind. They may seem to occur
            against your will. They may be repugnant to you, are often
            senseless, and may not fit your actual personality at all (for
            example, the recurrent thought or impulse to harm to your children,
            even though you never This test is designed to measure your
            obsessive comupulsive symptoms. Obsessions are unwelcome or
            distressing ideas, thoughts, images or impulses that repeatedly
            enter your mind. They may seem to occur against your will. They may
            be repugnant to you, are often senseless, and may not fit your
            actual personality at all. Compulsions are behaviors or acts that
            you feel driven to perform, even though you may recognize them as
            senseless or excessive. At times, you may try to resist doing them,
            but this may prove difficult. You may experience anxiety that does
            not diminish until the behavior is completed. Please read the test
            sentences and choose the best answer that fits you during the last 2
            weeks. This test is designed to measure your obsessive comupulsive
            symptoms. Obsessions are unwelcome or distressing ideas, thoughts,
            images or impulses that repeatedly enter your mind. They may seem to
            occur against your will. They may be repugnant to you, are often
            senseless, and may not fit your actual personality at all.
            Compulsions are behaviors or acts that you feel driven to perform,
            even though you may recognize them as senseless or excessive. At
            times, you may try to resist doing them, but this may prove
            difficult. You may experience anxiety that does not diminish until
            the behavior is completed. Please read the test sentences and choose
            the best answer that fits you during the last 2 weeks.

ar_description:
هذا الاختبار مخصص لقياس درجة الوسواس القهري لديك. الوساوس هي أفكار مزعجة تتكرر في ذهنك. تظهر لديك ضد إرادتك. تكون بالنسبة لك مكروهة وقد لا تتوافق
        مع شخصيتك . برجاء قراءة جمل الاختبار واختيار الإجابة الأنسب لك خلال
        الأسبوعين الماضيين.
        شاهد المزيد

title: PTSD
description:
This test assesses the psychological impact of stressful events after its ends by few months. Below is a list of problems and
            complaints that person sometimes have in response to stressful life
            experiences. Please read each one carefully, choose the answer that
            fits you mostly to indicate how much you have been bothered by that
            problem in the last month
            See More
ar_description:
هذا المقياس يقيس التأثير النفسي لبعض الأحداث الشديدة التي في الماضي ولازال أثرها قائم. فيما يلي قائمة بالمشكلات والشكاوى التي يشعر بها
        الأشخاص الذين مروا بخبرات صادمة في أوقات سابقة. من فضلك قم بقراءة كل
        جملة بعناية، واختر الإجابة الأنسب لك في ما شعرت به خلال الشهر الماضي
        شاهد المزيد

title: Adult ADHD Self-Report Scale
description:
Attention deficit hyperactivity disorder (ADHD) in adults is a mental health related disorder and includes a set of persistent
            problems, such as difficulty in attention, hyperactivity, and
            impulsive behavior. Attention deficit disorder with hyperactivity in
            adults may lead to unstable relationships, poor work or school
            performance, decreased self-confidence, and other problems.
            See More
ar_title: اضطراب نقص الانتباه مع فرط النشاط للبالغين (ADHD)
ar_description:
اضطراب نقص الانتباه مع فرط النشاط (ADHD) لدى البالغين هو اضطراب مرتبط بالصحة العقلية، ويتضمن مجموعة من المشكلات المستمرة، مثل صعوبة الانتباه،
        وفرط الحركة، والسلوك الاندفاعي. قد يُؤدِّي اضطراب نقص الانتباه مع فرط
        النشاط لدى البالغين إلى علاقات غير مستقرةٍ، وضعف العمل أو الأداء
        المدرسي، وتراجع الثقة بالنفس، وغيرها من المشكلات.
        شاهد المزيد
